title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. H, ch. I, pt. 349 - Interstate And Intrastate Transfer Of Probation Supervision For Adults And Juveniles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. H, ch. I, pt. 349 - Interstate And Intrastate Transfer Of Probation Supervision For Adults And Juveniles

State Regulations
§ 349.1 - Definitions
§ 349.2 - Objective
§ 349.3 - General requirements for the transfer of supervision of all probationers
§ 349.4 - Requirements for the intrastate transfers of supervision
§ 349.5 - Requirements for the temporary transfer of supervision of probationers
§ 349.6 - Administrative appeal
§ 349.7 - Restitution and other financial obligation

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. H, ch. I, pt. 349

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §§ 243[1], 259-mm; Family Court Act, § 176; Criminal Procedure Law, §410.80[1]; L. 2007, ch. 191; L. 2010, ch. 56; L. 2011, ch 29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
